trends: There has been one other sighting in Mendocino
There were no other sightings in Mendocino on or around
divs: Sighting DetailsI want to, but I can't. something makes it very difficult. I am filled with fear. I have never gone this far before. I have watched others tell thier story on TV. I was sworn to secrecy by the Airforce. But something stronger than that inhibits me. I think I can tell someone in person but I cant type it here like this..... Is there someone here in Sacramento with the MUFON that I can talk to in confidence? You have my contact info. mabe I can you on the telephone.
